name.ja: ボーン・スパイン・ウィップ

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.

effect.en: Select 1 Level 5 or lower Zombie Type monster in your Graveyard and add it to your hand or Special Summon it face-up to your field. Then, if you have a face-up WIND Attribute monster on your field, you can return 1 face-up Level 8 or higher monster from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.
